msContents.summary: Account for payments of taxes listing names and amounts paid in money

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; on the verso of both fragments, an account
Frag. (a) 14 lines; frag. (b) 12 lines; broken on all sides
The hand is an upright, compact cursive

supportDesc.support: 2 papyrus fragments; 18 x 12 and 11 x 6 cm

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col. I] . . .; . . dr. . . . Senpanechates s. of Panechates; . . . 2 dr. . . . Senpsenenoupis s. of Panch-; [l. 5] . . . 6 dr. 4 1/2 ob. . . . s. of Psen-; . . . 4 dr. [.] 1/2 ob. Thaminis s. of Haremiphis and . . .; . . . 6 dr. 3 1/2 ob. 2 chalk. Sentasnos s. of M-; . . . 9 dr. 5 1/2 ob. 2 chalk. . . .; . . . 9 dr. 5 1/2 ob. 2 chalk. Theraitis s. of Psenegeris; [l. 10] . . . 16 dr. 3 1/2 ob. 3 chalk. Pseriphis s. of Psenosiris; . . . 1 dr. 3 1/2 ob. 3 chalk. Panechates s. of Pouranoupis; . . . 3 1/2 ob. 2 chalk. Senaremiphis s. of Horos; . . . 1/2 ob. 2 chalk. Tebos s. of Phatreis and Senpanechpasti-; . . . 1/2 ob. 3 chalk. Senpetemeinis s. of Tanechatis . . .; [l. 15] . . . 1/2 ob. 3 chalk. Thaminis s. of Pansnos. [col. II] . . . ; . . . holds additional . . .; from Bassos also called Kolainos . . .; from Apollonios s. of Apollonios . . .; [l. 20] Niger . . .; outside of the northern wall . . .; . . . . in the region . . .; . . . of the village . . . dr. . . .; . . . in the same way; [l. 25] from Paniskos s. of Demetrios and A-; Thaminis s. of Apis . . .; . . .
